title: RESEARCH BRAND
description: Is the company is green-certified? See who their suppliers and maufacturers are, and see what the media is saying about it.

title: TAG & MATERIALS
description: Check the tag to see if the garment is made out of sustainable materials, if itâ€™s locally made, and how to care for it to make it last.

title: FABRIC SHEERNESS
description: If you can hold a garment up to the light and can't see the outline of your hand through the material, it suggests that the garment will be more durable over time.

title: DENIM STIFFNESS
description: Check to see how stiff a pair of jeans are. High quality denim is usually heavier and a bit stiff at first because of the material's higher thread count.

title: SEAMS & STITCHES
description: Tighter, more frequent stitches usually make for a stronger seam. More durable clothing should usually have hardier stitches with no discernible gaps.

title: STRETCH TEST
description: High-quality clothing material usually has good "recovery," which means that the fibers spring back into shape and maintain their form after being stretched.
